block.p: The nation's law enforcement community reported that it was suddenly facing another potential front in its longstanding war on drugs: a psychedelic drug nicknamed Ecstasy. It has gained wide appeal among young

people, particularly those on the nightclub circuit, and in the last 10 months, agents for the United States Customs Service have seized a record 8 million doses at the nation's airports and other ports of entry.
